<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> be <S%G3525>sober<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> suffer <S%G2553>hardship,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of an <S%G2099>evangelist,<s%> and <S%G4135>fulfill<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>
I have <S%G75>fought<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight.<s%> I have <S%G5055>finished<s%> the <S%G1408>course.<s%> I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

From now <S%G3063>on,<s%> there is stored <S%G606>up<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2923>judge,<s%> will <S%G591>give<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G25>those<s%> who have <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2015>appearing.<s%>

<S%G5342>Bring<s%> the <S%G5341>cloak<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G620>left<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2591>Carpus<s%> when you <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G975>books,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> the <S%G3200>parchments.<s%>

<S%G1722>At<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G627>defense,<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> came to <S%G4836>help<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1459>left<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%> <S%G3049>May<s%> it <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G3049>held<s%> against <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G4506>deliver<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G4982>preserve<s%> me <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G932>Kingdom;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>forever<s%> <S%G165><s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
